LanguageData.NAT_Apparel_PainLance.label: pain lance
LanguageData.NAT_Apparel_PainLance.description:
A limited-use psychic effector. It induces pain into the target and creatures nearby.
This pain lance was crafted from a broken shard of dark archotechnology.
LanguageData.NAT_PainPulser.label: pain pulser
LanguageData.NAT_PainPulser.description: A one-use broad-wave psychic effector created from a dark archotech shard. The device creates a pulse that induces pain into living creatures within the region. People and animals currently under your control will not be affected.
